job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you have a creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems? If so then you will enjoy working in our EUV Source Laser department! It's a great opportunity for professional development and personal growth. Especially when you are a true self-starter who likes to understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system.
       You are part of a multidisciplinary team that focuses on performance qualification, integration and feasibility studies in order to secure the next generation EUV Source Laser.
       Role and responsibilities
          + Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
          + Monitor integrity of system architecture during development, ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
          + Perform feasibility studies, support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
          + Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
          + Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
          + Define, plan, manage own backlog of work
job_details.full_text:
System Integration and Test Engineer

Do you have a creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems? If so then you will enjoy working in our EUV Source Laser department! It's a great opportunity for professional development and personal growth. Especially when you are a true self-starter who likes to understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system.
       You are part of a multidisciplinary team that focuses on performance qualification, integration and feasibility studies in order to secure the next generation EUV Source Laser.
       Role and responsibilities
          + Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
          + Monitor integrity of system architecture during development, ensure the availability of Test Specifications, and coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
          + Perform feasibility studies, support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
          + Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
          + Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
          + Define, plan, manage own backlog of work

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on system integration and testing within a laser and optical system, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. The responsibilities are centered around traditional engineering tasks like feasibility studies, test specifications, and fleet performance analysis, not AI model development or deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrating knowledge from various function clusters for full system understanding in terms of fleet performance
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand how different parts of the system contribute to overall performance, which aligns with understanding the business context and how technical components serve it.

job_tasks.phrase: support the development of product road maps, advise on future product definition and system specifications
job_tasks.justification: Advising on product roadmaps and future definitions requires understanding business strategy and market needs to guide technical development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties to improve the decision processes
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to translate technical information for various stakeholders to facilitate informed decision-making, a key aspect of business understanding and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitor integrity of system architecture during development
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly software development, monitoring system architecture during development implies an understanding of how components are built and interact, which is related to software engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure the availability of Test Specifications
job_tasks.justification: Defining and ensuring the availability of test specifications is a crucial part of the development lifecycle, ensuring quality and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: coordinate or execute the testing process. As well as analyze and report out results
job_tasks.justification: Testing and analyzing results are core activities in ensuring the quality and functionality of a developed system, aligning with software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Plan and perform engineering work concerned with unique problems that have a major effect on fleet performance
job_tasks.justification: This involves problem-solving within the engineering domain, which often includes aspects of system design and development to address performance issues.

job_tasks.phrase: Define, plan, manage own backlog of work
job_tasks.justification: Managing a backlog is a common practice in software development and project management, indicating a structured approach to work execution.
Feasibility studies involve evaluating the viability of technical approaches or systems, which can include aspects of modeling or simulation to assess potential outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: creative way of thinking and do you like to be challenged in solving complex problems
understand and improve a complex high power laser and optical system
Ensure and support optimal communication of specifications to all relevant parties
